name: The Indigenous Agency
description:
We offer world class content creation coupled with state of the art amplification and monitoring to deliver genuinely compelling content experiences - directly to targeted users, via their favourite channels, exactly when and where they are at their most receptive. The move towards a new ‘content based’ search model (Google’s ZMOT) is having a significant negative impact on many business’s search rankings.
Meanwhile, consumers are becoming increasingly resistant to traditional media and advertising, preferring to do their own research online and reference personal testimonials and genuine user feedback.
